title: Spaghetti

verbs: To consume something solid or semi-solid (usually food) by putting it into the mouth and eventually swallowing it.
To consume (something solid or semi-solid, usually food) by putting it into the mouth and swallowing it.
nouns: The head.
Informal terms for a human head
Nick Jr. is an American digital cable and satellite television channel that is owned by the MTV Networks Kids & Family Group, a unit of the Viacom Media Networks division of Viacom.
The human head
American pre-school channel formerly called Noggin
American cable television channel
The head or brain.
The brain, the head.
A variety of long, thin pasta, originally from Italy, which consists mostly of semolina.
Informally, any type of pasta.
Spaghetti is a long, thin, cylindrical pasta of Italian origin.
Type of pasta
Spaghetti served with a tomato sauce
A pasta dish sometimes served in a bowl.
An inhabitant of Italy, or a person of Italian descent.
A person from Italy, or of Italian ancestry.
Italians are a nation and ethnic group native to Italy who share a common Italian culture, ancestry and speak the Italian language as a mother tongue.
Nation and ethnic group native to Italy
A native or inhabitant of Italy
(particularly in Italian cooking) Dough made from wheat and water and sometimes mixed with egg and formed into various shapes; often sold in dried form, it is typically boiled for eating.
Pieces of dough made from wheat and water.
Pasta is a staple food of traditional Italian cuisine, with the first reference dating to 1154 in Sicily.
Type of noodle and is a staple food of traditional Italian cuisine
A type of Italian food made from flour, eggs and water and shaped in different forms. Usually, they are cooked and served with a sauce.
Shaped and dried dough made from flour and water and sometimes egg
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: A plate of Italian spaghetti with tomato sauce, as a bolognese, with a fork twirling its long, thin noodles. Garnished with a green herb, as parsley, on some platforms.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the spaghetti emoji presents a tantalizing tangle of perfectly cooked pasta, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading.  Each strand boasts a subtle sheen, catching the light with realistic highlights that convey a sense of delicious texture.  This vibrant dish, often adorned with a hint of red sauce, evokes feelings of comfort, celebration, and shared meals, making it a delightful way to express culinary enjoyment on Apple devices.
